statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 1 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(permission_level) AS max_permission FROM user_permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING user_id > 2;
SELECT user_id, SUM(permission_level) AS total_permissions FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY total_permissions DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM access_levels WHERE access_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, access_name FROM user_permissions JOIN access_levels ON user_permissions.permission_level = access_levels.access_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_permissions
SELECT * FROM user_permissions
SELECT user_id, role_id, permission_name FROM user_permissions
SELECT role_id, permission_name, user_id FROM user_permissions
SELECT access_level_id, access_name, access_description FROM access_levels
SELECT * FROM roles
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission_name, role_id FROM user_permissions WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(*) AS num_users FROM roles JOIN user_permissions ON roles.role_id = user_permissions.role_id GROUP BY role_name;

SELECT permission_name, access_description FROM user_permissions JOIN access_levels ON user_permissions.user_id = access_levels.access_level_id WHERE user_permissions.role_id = 3 ORDER BY permission_name DESC;

SELECT user_id, access_name, role_name FROM user_permissions JOIN roles ON user_permissions.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN access_levels ON user_permissions.user_id = access_levels.access_level_id WHERE user_permissions.permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND username = 'admin';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM roles JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 2 AND role_id = 1;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE roles.role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT users.username, COUNT(role_id) AS num_roles FROM users LEFT JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING num_roles >= 2;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id INNER JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE users.user_id = 3 AND role_permissions.permission_id IN (1, 2, 3);
